# Security Monitoring

## Tools

- CodeQL Analysis
- Dependabot
- Security advisories

## Workflows

### 1. Code Scanning

- Weekly full scans
- PR scans
- Vulnerability detection

### 2. Dependency Scanning

- Version monitoring
- Security patches
- Breaking changes

### 3. Access Control

- Branch protection
- Required reviews
- Status checks

## Configuration Files

- `.github/workflows/codeql.yml`
- `.github/workflows/security.yml`
- `.github/dependabot.yml`
